This means the server that hosts your file does not allow requests from other sites (cross-origin requests, or CORS). You need to move the asset to a server that allows cross-origin file downloads. Start with the original GitHub URL of the file. For example: https://github.com/username/repository/blob/branch/filename. 2. Replace "github.com" with "raw.githubusercontent.com". 3. Remove the "/blob/" part of the URL.
